title: anjuvadEnO nanjE
sahitya:
anjuvadEnO nanjE vINil anjuvadEnO


anupallavi

  nanjuDai nAgam pOl nartanamADiya anjana vaNNanin aruL tanaip-peTra pin


caraNam    cittamAm kOvilil kaNNanuru vaittu bhakti enum poighaip-punita nIrADip-
paNgalenum naru malar koNDu arcittu mukti tarum vazhi muyanru kai piDitta pin
